PAGE.p: Experimental support for F5 SSL VPN was added to OpenConnect in March 2021. It is a PPP-based protocol using the native PPP support which was merged into the 9.00 release.

F5 mode is requested by adding --protocol=f5 to the command line:
openconnect --protocol=f5 big-ip.example.com
OpenConnect does not yet support the UDP transport for F5, and will use PPP over TCP for connectivity.
